channel.title: LDR Replacement on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in LDR Replacement on 0x000216

item.title: Bay Area Beogram 8002: Checking the Forward/Reverse Scanning LDR Devices
item.description: My previous work on this Beogram left me concerned about a potential issue with one of the forward/reverse scanning LDRs (Light Dependent Resistors). Testing the resistance of both LDRs with +15 VDC on the light source, I noticed a significant difference between them, leading me to believe one was faulty. However, upon removing and re-testing them, the resistance values were much closer. It’s important to note that my testing method involved a simple setup with an LED work light as a light source.
